actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
payments.retailer_code,
payments.payment_id, 
payments.payment_ticket_status,
payments.payment_type,
payments.payment_mode, 
payments.payment_status,
payments.amount_paid,
payments.taxable_amt,
payments.gst_amt,
payments.transaction_id, 
to_char(payments.transaction_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as transaction_date,  
payments.payment_source,
to_char(payments.payment_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_start_date,
to_char(payments.payment_end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_end_date,
payments.payment_clearance_status, 
payments.payment_received_by,
payments.remarks,
to_char(payments.created_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as created_time, 
payments.created_by, 
payments.deleted,  
to_char(payments.updated_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as updated_time, 
payments.updated_by,  
to_char(payments.payment_clear_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_clear_date,  
payments.invoice_sent_status, 
payments.invoice_no,
ret.retailer_name,
to_char(ret.install_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as install_date,
ret.ideal_days as current_ideal_days,
ret.address,
ret.area_zone,
ret.ideal_days,
ret.amc,
ret.installation_amount,
ret.license_days,
offer.offer_code,
payments.amc_months
FROM public.payments
LEFT JOIN retailer as ret on payments.retailer_code=ret.retailer_code
left join retailer_offers as offer on offer.offer_id=payments.offer_id
where (payments.payment_id)=({{payment_request_table.triggeredRow.payment_id}});
